reviewText: I got this movie and I love it but it is in Spanish. Do you have a copy in English?
This is a wonderful movie about an innocent little boys faith in Jesus and his love for the mom he never met. Excellent packaging and prompt delivery.

a beautiful childhood story. i loved the old version film ,when i was a school boy it brought a tear to my eye,a very happy memory for me.
and cant wait to watch it with my grandchildren.
I am very happy with my purchase love that movie it is in color because the ones I had seen they were withe and black but this one is better thank you God bless you!!!

The first old one I think is better.
But is ok the new one.
The little boy is good actor

Well, I bought the video as a gift to my aunt because someone had told her that there was a new version of the movie. However, to our surprise the movie is the original one from the 60s (with Pablito Calvo). So the movie itself is epic ,but it was not what we wanted because the picture on the item shows the new movie.

After communicating with the seller, they sent the new movie for free and I got to keep the old version and the new version. I really appreciated that they corrected the order.
